attributes.action: Build a block of flats in London for M.P's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P's are claiming expenses for 2nd homes costing the taxpayers a fortune.  The solution is simple build a block of flats in London for M.P's to stay over thus they would have somewhere to stay and not need to travel long distances to their family homes. Also M.P's not turning up to work should have wage deducted for that they unless they are working in their constituency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
